avatar.description: Details related to the avatar of the project.

dateCreated.description: Date and time when the project was created.

features.description: List of features enabled for the project.

firstEvent.description: Details about the first event recorded for the project.

hasAccess.description: Flag indicating if the user has access to the project.

isBookmarked.description: Flag indicating if the project is bookmarked by the user.

isInternal.description: Flag indicating if the project is for internal purposes.

isMember.description: Flag indicating if the user is a member of the project.

isPublic.description: Flag indicating if the project is public.

organization.description: Details about the organization associated with the project.

avatar.description: Details related to the avatar of the organization.

dateCreated.description: Date and time when the organization was created.

isEarlyAdopter.description: Flag indicating if the organization is an early adopter.

hasAuthProvider.description: Flag indicating if an external authorization provider is linked.

regionUrl.description: URL related to the region of the organization.

require2FA.description: Flag indicating if two-factor authentication is required.

slug.description: Unique identifier associated with the organization.

requireEmailVerification.description: Flag indicating if email verification is necessary.

features.description: List of features enabled for the organization.

platform.description: The platform on which the project is running.

slug.description: Unique slug associated with the project.

access.description: Information about access permissions for the project.

firstTransactionEvent.description: Details about the first transaction event.

hasMonitors.description: Flag indicating if monitors are set up for the project.

hasProfiles.description: Flag indicating if profiles are available for the project.

hasReplays.description: Flag indicating if replay functionality is enabled.

hasSessions.description: Flag indicating if session tracking is active for the project.

hasFeedbacks.description: Flag indicating if feedback functionality is available for the project.

hasNewFeedbacks.description: Flag indicating if there are new feedback entries.

hasCustomMetrics.description: Flag indicating if custom metrics are enabled for the project.

hasMinifiedStackTrace.description: Flag indicating if minified stack trace feature is enabled.
